name: Fire Chat - K-BulMung
description:
Let's go camping with K-BulMung.

When we go camping in Korea, we play with fire.
They think about many things and I also gain peace while playing with BulMung.

There are two ways to enjoy K-BulMung.

If you want to play the game quietly, you can enjoy K-BulMung alone, and if you want to play the game alone, you can enjoy K-BulMung with people all over the world through multi-game.

Are you lonely because you are alone?
Don’t you worry!
You can go to K-BulMung by chatting with many people all over the world!

K-BulMung simulation game with a comfortable atmosphere.
Have fun with K-BulMung Chat.
